website_summaries.verdict: A simple two-tier console table with a glass surface.
pros: This sturdy console table has a lower shelf that's perfect for holding cable boxes or Blu-ray players
Measures 42.5 inches wide by 14.5 inches deep by 30 inches high
cons: Assembly may be difficult due to misaligned holes

customer_reviews.title: Great bedroom/hallway/ living room console
customer_reviews.text: I needed a decorative yet functional table for my bedroom. This table was "sturdy enough", had a low price and looks a lot more expensive than it is. I have some books and art on it which works fine but I would not use it for anything heavy like a TV. It was easy to put together by myself and took me about 1 hour. I gave it 5 stars for the cost, material quality and ease of putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: JAK in NYC

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I did not do much research on this product before I purchased it....shame on me. I will say it did arrive well packaged. However, the quality of the table is sub-par. The screws did not tighten all the way, the legs were out of line with the holes and once it was all together, it wobbled. My husband was able to make some tweaks on his own to make it more sturdy. I would return it but I like the way it looks and out of pure laziness, I don't want to go through the hassle of repackaging the item and shipping such a large box back. Just wanted to post for other consumers to beware!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Highly do not recommend. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Highly do not recommend. You get what you pay for! Pain in the ASS to put together. None of the screw holes lined up . After 1.5 hours of trying a million ways, holes would not match up. From a distance it looks nice the way I had to screw it in to place but up close looks like CRAP. Not worth the effort to send back. Spend a $100 or two more on a decent product and save yourself the frustration.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa c rode

customer_reviews.title: May be challenging to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to put this together. My 30+ very smart daughter came over to help, but with no success. The holes justdo not line up. Too much effort to return such a large package. So goodbye money, hello junk. Updating my earlier review. A visiting friend was able to put this together without much difficulty. So now that I am able to use it, I am happy with the product and it’s price point.
customer_reviews.author: GNMS

customer_reviews.title: Everything else came into play because of this great looking table
customer_reviews.text: I created a redecorating project for myself and this was my first purchase on that project. Everything else came into play because of this great looking table.
customer_reviews.author: picha_boo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy side table
customer_reviews.text: This went to together fairly quickly, would have been easier with another person. Everything doesn't line up perfectly, but it's certainly good enough for my needs. Sturdy, not at all wobbly (I put it together on a wood floor to make sure of this). I love the extra shelf, most of the glass shelf tables only have the one. I like the finish, it's a somewhat distressed silver, not too shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Heather W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but a bit difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy product. Assembly takes a little bit of wrestling and arm strength to get the frames to line up with the brackets on the legs. I think I left one bolt out because I couldn't get the holes lined up, but since the bolts are good quality I don't think that will compromise the product's sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: JMac

customer_reviews.title: Simple way to update any room!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. No issues no dents dings or any other issues. Super nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dasiey201

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, modern look, and sturdy. It was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: April Garrett

customer_reviews.title: It is Distressed Grey NOT SILVER
customer_reviews.text: I like the product overall. I'm using it to place office files on. So, nothing heavy is on it. The only thing I didn't like is that the color is very grey NOT silver. Color makes it look cheap. I'm going to spray paint it silver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for bedroom tv
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 40" flat screen. Table went together perfectly after I studied the directions for awhile. No dents or scratches. Looks light and airy.
customer_reviews.author: mjo

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, very sturdy and great looking. Everything i was looking for. Very happy with purchase. I wish they made a matching bookcase.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Mullersman

customer_reviews.title: It a decent table
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy this to fill in for the holiday, I was surprised, it was a decent little table for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for entryway space. Tempered glass a good bonus. Easy to assemble. Decent value.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with side tables
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tables. I like that they have several shelves. They were a little hard to put together. But... I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kulp

customer_reviews.title: Holes do not line up for screws!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!! Holes do not line up. I purchased 32 tables. The top on each table is only screwed in on 3 sides. Impossible to do the last leg. Very poor quality control!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy to assemble and very sturdy. Great addition to my new apartment. When assembling make sure the read the instructions (I frustrated myself but when looking at the instructions it became 1000x easier) took maybe 10 minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love the way this table looks in our bathroom
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the way this table looks in our bathroom. I wasn't sure if the finish would make the table appear chintzy, but it doesn't. Our floor is porcelain and has a rustic barn-wood look. This table goes perfectly with it, and adds elegance to the room. Wasn't sure if it would be too low in height, but it is just right. Highly recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: No indication the product contains lead on the description of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnteeha

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: Ve had it for about a year now and still think it's great
customer_reviews.author: CMK

customer_reviews.title: I really do like this table it looks great in my living room
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this table it looks great in my living room. I did however think it was a chrome finish which i was a little disappointed it wasn't. But if you look closely at the picture it does show that its more of a distressed silver/black. Overall very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria s

customer_reviews.title: Love the distressed metal look and assembly was easy for ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as night stands in a guest room. Love the distressed metal look and assembly was easy for my husband. They are sturdy and sit at the perfect height next to a king size bed. I liked them so much that I bought a 3rd one to use as an end table between two designer chairs at the foot of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Haston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great piece... Exactly what I needed to complete my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: ... was really excited about this console table and even liked the look of the pieces as I was unpacking ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this console table and even liked the look of the pieces as I was unpacking it from the box. Unfortunately, the holes for the screws were poorly measured, screws that came with it were not the right length, and it was near impossible to get them to thread- ultimately, we got it standing but it is very unstable. I saw this table on another site and it got very good reviews but I have no idea why or how.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lively

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's glass and light shines through to the plants on the second shelf. Easy to assemble. Second shelf is fixed in place.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect compliment to my decor. Strong and sturdy. Install was about 30 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Table
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality table, easy to assemble and sturdy. Fits nicely in small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for record player and records
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold my record player and records. Works well. The records barely fit on the bottom shelf, but so glad they do!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ann Sorbel

product_meta.title: SEI Furniture Jaymes Metal & Glass 2-Tier, Console Table, Silver/Black Distressing
product_meta.description: Bring contemporary appeal into your home with this transitional console table. The brushed silver finished frame with black distressing is a stunning contrast against the glass tabletop and convenient glass shelf. The two-tiered design forms a shadowbox effect that makes this table a perfect canvas for displaying books, photos, or precious keepsakes. Its two- tier design provides ample storage. Place this console table along your couch or in your entryway to accommodate all of your décor needs. Slight variations in distressed finish may occur. Dimensions include: Overall: 42.5" W x 14.5" D x 30" H; Tabletop: 41.75" W x 13.75" D; Shelf: 41.75" W x 12" D x 8" H; Clearance: 39.5" W x 11.5" D x 20.75" H. This one-of-a-kind item approximately weighs 33.5 pounds and can support up to 25 pounds (tabletop), 15 pounds (shelf). Only quality materials and manufacturing will do. Product materials include: rectangular metal tube, 5mm clear tempered glass. Assembly: Required. Made in China.
feature_bullets: Transitional console table features a two -tier design that provides ample storage and shelving space
Show off decorative accessories or store magazines in the living room
Silver with black distressed finish combines with a geometric shape and tapered legs for contemporary to transitional style
Chic furniture piece is made with sturdy, rectangular metal tube and durable 5mm clear tempered glass
Sofa table weighs 33.5 pounds, supports 40 pounds, and measures 42.5 inches wide x 14.5 inches deep x 30 inches high
Included components: Charming furniture piece is made with rectangular metal tube, and 5 millimeter clear tempered glass
